```{r, results='asis'}
require(ncovr)
Sys.setlocale('LC_CTYPE', 'Chinese')
ncov <- get_ncov('csv', 'rumors')$rumors
ncov$title <- gsub('\u00A0', ' ', ncov$title)

cat(paste0('## ', ncov$title, '  \n\n',
    ncov$mainSummary, '  \n\n',
    ncov$body),
    sep = '  \n\n')
```
